alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 6:57PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Weber... eastern Box Elder...northwestern Davis and north central Tooele Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 657 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Snowville to 15 miles west of Corinne to 11 miles west of Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ogden, Layton, Farmington, Brigham City, Tremonton, Snowville, Hill Air Force Base, Roy, Clearfield, Kaysville, Syracuse, Clinton, North Ogden, South Ogden, Washington Terrace, Riverdale, Hooper, South Weber, Perry and Willard. This storm will be capable of producing strong gusty winds on the Great Salt Lake. This will lead to a sudden increase in waves and very choppy waters which will result in hazardous boating conditions. Boaters are urged to seek safe harbor if possible. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 327 and 397, and near mile marker 399. Interstate 84 between mile markers 0 and 86. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 79 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
